Dear user(s),

with this email you receive the data and script files from your recent
experiment {{proposal}} (from {{from_date}} to {{to_date}}) on KWS-3.

Please let us know about the quality of the data and your satisfaction
with our support. Do not forget to submit an experimental report,
especially if you will ask for further beam time.

If you have further questions concerning this experiment, please always
include the proposal number ({{proposal}}) in your communication.

Regards,
  The KWS-3 Team
